function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of financial resources for community consolidation and access to information","Impact":"Inability to self-organize or access resources during an outbreak","Mitigation":"Establish cash transfer systems and utilize mobile money for quick and safe resource access","Technologies":"Cash transfer systems, mobile money","People":"Communities, informal networks","Owner":"Financial support organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of social protection for low-paid insecure workers","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of low-paid workers to contagion and financial insecurity","Mitigation":"Interventions to address informal livelihoods, protect low-paid insecure workers, and provide childcare support and food distribution","Technologies":"Social protection interventions","People":"Low-paid insecure workers, vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government, social support organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of protective equipment for at-risk workers","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion for community health volunteers and garbage collectors","Mitigation":"Provision of masks and gloves to at-risk workers","Technologies":"Protective equipment (masks, gloves)","People":"Community health volunteers, garbage collectors","Owner":"Health organizations, local authorities"}]}
